source.75faf505:
from autoplotter import run_app # Importing the autoplotter for GUI Based EDA
import pandas as pd # Importing Pandas to read csv

df = pd.read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ersaurabhverma/autoplotter/master/Data/data.csv") # Reading data

run_app(df,mode = "inline") # Calling the autoplotter.run_app in inline mode
source.1940e97e:
#Click the IP Address and move to seperate IE.
run_app(df,mode = "external") # Calling the autoplotter.run_app in external mode
source.b24e765f:
# Autoplotter

Autoplotter is a python package for GUI based exploratory data analysis. It is built on the top of dash.
Visit: Philip Volet - Github: https://github.com/ersaurabhverma/autoplotter

Use the package manager pip to install autoplotter. $pip install autoplotter
